meanings.definition: Showing contempt or scorn by curling the upper lip.
meanings.sent1: The sneerful bully made fun of others with a mean look on his face.
meanings.sent2: She gave a sneerful glance to show her disapproval.
meanings.sent3: The sneerful cat looked down on the tiny mouse with a haughty expression.
meanings.sent4: His sneerful attitude towards the new student made them feel unwelcome.
meanings.sent5: The sneerful teacher's expression made the students uneasy in class.

meanings.definition: Full of sneers or mocking expressions.
meanings.sent1: The sneerful crowd laughed mockingly at the clumsy dancer.
meanings.sent2: Her sneerful remarks hurt his feelings deeply.
meanings.sent3: The sneerful group of friends teased each other playfully.
meanings.sent4: The sneerful tone of his voice revealed his lack of respect.
meanings.sent5: The sneerful atmosphere in the room made everyone uncomfortable.
